description: This file defines the Attendance model and associated enum for managing attendance records within a kindergarten management system. It includes fields such as student ID, date, attendance status, check-in/check-out times, notes, and recorder ID, along with methods for serialization, deserialization, and copying Attendance objects.

classes.name: Attendance
classes.description: Model class representing a student's attendance record, with properties for ID, student ID, date, status, check-in/out times, notes, and recorder ID. Includes methods for converting to/from map and copying instances.

classes.name: AttendanceStatus
classes.description: Enum defining possible attendance statuses: present, absent, late, and excused.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts an Attendance object to a Map<String, dynamic> for serialization.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates an Attendance object from a Map<String, dynamic>, facilitating deserialization.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a copy of the Attendance object with optional property overrides.

methods.name: statusDisplayName
methods.description: Getter that returns the attendance status as an uppercase string.
